item.title: DOCSIS 3.0 Fiberizes Cable Broadband
item.description:
Cable companies have been envious of Verizon’s FiOS fiber optic service because it surpasses the broadband capabilities of coaxial cable. However, a new upgrade to the DOCSIS cable broadband standard might change that. This upgrade boosts digital download speeds to rival those of fiber optic connections, all without needing a fiber optic line to the home. DOCSIS, which stands for Data Over Cable Service Interface Specification, is the standard for cable modems...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/docsis-30-fiberizes-cable-broadband/
